page.title: 14The Voe Concert Party.
page.content: The Voe concert party is a group of local people who perform around Shetland.They sing songs,do sketches and recite poetry all in the Shetland dialect.They compose their own material which is mainly about topical local events.Humour is the main ingredient of their performances and the audiences are always greatly entertained. After the concert a dance may be held. This would consist of waltzes and reels,being danced to traditional Shetland music which would be provided by the concert muscians.The money raised goes to the Voe hall funds. There was a concert party about 25 years ago but it disbanded until 1980 when it restarted,much to everyones delight.
